thread.title: Little Caesars Pizza Founder Mike Ilitch Dies at 87
thread.title_full: Little Caesars Pizza Founder Mike Ilitch Dies at 87 - WSJ

author: John D. Stoll
title: Little Caesars Pizza Founder Mike Ilitch Dies at 87
text:
Mike Ilitch, the founder of Little Caesars Pizza and the owner of two professional sports teams in Detroit, died Friday afternoon, according to statements released by Ilitch Holdings Inc. He was 87.

Mr. Ilitch founded the pizza chain in Garden City, Mich., in 1959 and went on to build several businesses and hold substantial real estate in Detroit over the following decades. He also revived the Detroit Red Wings National Hockey...
